name: Make it Rain Bitcoins - Become the First Bitcoin Billionaire!
name_original: Make it Rain Bitcoins - Become the First Bitcoin Billionaire!
description:
How fast can you make it rain bitcoins? No, really… how fast???

It’s a fiendishly clever game, that’s too simple and too easy and too hard and too fun. But what does it all mean…

Well, just start swiping and watch the bitcoins pile up. Hundreds, then thousands, then millions, then billions, then kili-billies, mega-billies, and beyond. But to get that much you’ll have to make some wise investments!

Maybe you’ll invest in venture capital, loan sharking, or offshore drilling.

***DOWNLOAD NOW***

***Note: None of these Bitcoins are real! Just a game!***
